tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I went to meet him for lower back pain. Within minutes he found out what is the cause. He was honest in telling that exercise and posture correction will bring more relief rather than medicine.Lots of Doctors would have prescribed unnecessary and costly medicines, he did not do that. Many doctors would have asked for costly testss like spinal MRI. He said clearly ,these tests are not needed.
In short, he is Doctors in a way as Doctor should be. I will strongly recommend him for any orthopaedic problem.

Dr.Mohan Chand is absolutely awesome doctor I have already undergone forearm surgery, his done a fantastic job 
Now my son had also gone for undergone forearm surgery 
Overall I would suggest to all the patients for any orthopedic issue will definitely go for Dr.Mohan Chand 
Thanks
Amit Kapoor
**********

I am suffering from Morel Lavallelle lesions and so worried about it. Dr. Mohan Chand diagnosed well and Finally I am being cured. Dr. Mohan chand is a very honest and dutyful doctor. He has not prescribed any costly medicine and believe to cure patient by naturally.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to the Doctor bcoz I was not able to straighten my hand due to improper exercise thus was very tensed. He just toched my hand and said it's not a muscle fracture and explained the problem really well. He didn't prescribed unnecessary medicines.Thanks a lot Doctor and I recommend him to anyone and everyone:)

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am completely satisfied by the line of his treatment. *** *********** ********* *** exercises have worked wonder in my case. From the day one of starting the medicine and exercise, my pain reduced to zero.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He focuses on explaining the problem rather than just giving medicines and re-visits. Does not give unnecessary importance to medical treatments but natural therapy. *******
It was explained perfectly with the help of x-ray film that the problem /pain is due to nil gaps and abolition of grease  in knee joint bones.
nice Doctor, nicely explained the disease band its cure, nice Doctor to get treated for the disease
** ** *** ****  ********** ** ** **** *****  diagnosed to the point ********** and very friendly nature I had a surgery of acl reconstruction I'm fully satisfied recommended best dr
A doctor who advise you exercise, small things to change in daily routine and no need of medicine. He is too good....
